dcterms:creator: M. Veta
P. van Diest
S. Willems
dcterms:description: The AMIDA13 dataset consists of high power field images from 23 breast cancer cases, used for detecting mitotic figures in histopathology images.
dcterms:title: AMIDA13

dcterms:creator: J. Staal
M. D. Abramoï¬€
M. Niemeijer
dcterms:description: The DRIVE dataset consists of 40 retinal images with manual segmentations, used for segmenting blood vessels in retinal images.
dcterms:title: DRIVE

dcterms:creator: I. Arganda-Carreras
S. C. Turaga
dcterms:description: The ISBI EM segmentation challenge dataset consists of 2 volumes (1 train, 1 test), each containing 30 consecutive images from a serial section transmission EM, used for segmenting cell boundaries.
dcterms:title: ISBI EM segmentation challenge
